items.name: Niger Delta Aqua Discovery
items.short_description: Explore the diverse marine life of the Niger Delta and beyond, featuring interactive exhibits and touch pools for young explorers.
items.address: 12 Peter Odili Road, Trans Amadi, Port Harcourt

items.name: Coral Reef Kids' Zone
items.short_description: A vibrant, child-friendly aquarium focusing on colorful coral ecosystems and small tropical fish, with engaging storytelling sessions.
items.address: 4B Old GRA Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Oceanic Wonders PH
items.short_description: Experience the magic of the ocean with captivating exhibits, including a walk-through tunnel and feeding demonstrations.
items.address: 22 Aba Road, Rumuokoro, Port Harcourt

items.name: Little Swimmers Exhibit
items.short_description: A smaller, intimate aquarium designed for toddlers and preschoolers, focusing on local freshwater species and gentle interaction.
items.address: 15 Woji Road, GRA Phase 2, Port Harcourt

items.name: StarGazers Junior Dome
items.short_description: An immersive dome experience designed for young children, taking them on a journey through our solar system and basic constellations.
items.address: 3 GRA Phase 2, Port Harcourt

items.name: Cosmic Kids Theatre
items.short_description: Featuring captivating animated shows about space, planets, and rockets, making astronomy fun and accessible for all ages.
items.address: Plot 10, Trans Amadi Industrial Layout, Port Harcourt

items.name: Galaxy Explorers Hub
items.short_description: An interactive planetarium experience with virtual reality stations that allow children to 'walk' on different planets and moons.
items.address: 5 Rumola Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Little Astronauts Observatory
items.short_description: Combines a small observatory with a planetarium, offering guided telescope viewing of celestial objects on clear days.
items.address: 18 G.U. Ake Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Rainbow Rollerland
items.short_description: A classic amusement park with a variety of gentle rides for younger children, including carousels, mini-trains, and kiddie swings.
items.address: 15 Trans Amadi Industrial Layout, Port Harcourt

items.name: Joyful Junction Park
items.short_description: Features a collection of themed rides for toddlers and preschoolers, with a focus on safety and bright, engaging designs.
items.address: Plot 7, Rumuokoro Link Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Thrillville Juniors
items.short_description: Offers slightly more adventurous rides for older children, including a mini roller coaster, bumper cars, and a small Ferris wheel.
items.address: 22 Ada George Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: WonderWheel Playground
items.short_description: Combines a variety of small amusement rides with extensive play structures, offering a full day of active fun for kids.
items.address: 8 Nkpogu Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: PH Kid's Critter Corner
items.short_description: A delightful petting zoo where children can safely interact with friendly farm animals, learn about animal care, and enjoy pony rides.
items.address: 4B Old GRA Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Nature's Ark Zoolet
items.short_description: A smaller, educational zoo focusing on local wildlife and conservation efforts, offering guided tours and animal feeding sessions.
items.address: 22 Aba Road, Rumuokoro, Port Harcourt

items.name: Safari Juniors PH
items.short_description: Explore themed zones with a variety of animals from different continents, featuring a kids' safari train ride and wildlife shows.
items.address: 12 Peter Odili Road, Trans Amadi, Port Harcourt

items.name: Farm Friends Haven
items.short_description: A charming mini-farm where kids can meet and feed domestic animals, collect eggs, and enjoy a true countryside experience.
items.address: Eneka Road, Rumuokoro, Port Harcourt

items.name: Toon Town PH
items.short_description: Meet your favorite cartoon characters daily at this lively hub, offering photo opportunities, sing-alongs, and mini-parades.
items.address: Port Harcourt Mall, 10 Aba Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Hero Haven Encounters
items.short_description: Step into a world of superheroes and princesses! Kids can meet their idols, get autographs, and participate in themed activities.
items.address: Aztech Arcum, Stadium Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Storybook Friends Fest
items.short_description: A delightful gathering where classic storybook characters come to life, offering interactive readings and imaginative play.
items.address: 7 Old GRA Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Mascot Mania Meetup
items.short_description: Catch a rotating roster of popular local and international mascots for high-energy meet-and-greets and dance parties.
items.address: Pleasure Park, Aba Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Discovery Dome Children's Museum
items.short_description: A hands-on museum focused on science, technology, engineering, and arts (STEAM) for curious young minds.
items.address: Plot 1, GRA Phase 3, Port Harcourt

items.name: Creative Kids Hub
items.short_description: Encouraging imagination and artistic expression through various craft stations, role-play areas, and storytelling corners.
items.address: 17 Trans Amadi Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Little Explorers Gallery
items.short_description: Introduces children to Nigerian history and culture through engaging exhibits, traditional games, and interactive displays.
items.address: 4 Old GRA Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Innovation Station Junior
items.short_description: A museum dedicated to engineering and building, where kids can design, construct, and test their own creations.
items.address: 25 Peter Odili Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Enchantia Magic Theatre
items.short_description: Experience dazzling magic and grand illusions in a family-friendly theatre setting, with weekly shows featuring renowned magicians.
items.address: The Arena Event Centre, 12 Sani Abacha Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: The Grand Illusionist's Parlour
items.short_description: An intimate setting for awe-inspiring close-up magic and mentalism, designed to captivate and mystify young audiences.
items.address: Genesis Centre, 50 Ken Saro-Wiwa Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: WonderWorks Magic & Fun
items.short_description: Combines magic performances with interactive workshops where children can learn simple tricks and create their own magic props.
items.address: 15 Woji Road, GRA Phase 2, Port Harcourt

items.name: Mystic Realm Shows
items.short_description: Themed magic productions that weave illusions into enchanting stories, perfect for sparking imagination in young audiences.
items.address: Filmhouse Cinemas, Azikiwe Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Jungle Gym Kids Play
items.short_description: A multi-level soft play area with slides, ball pits, and climbing structures, ensuring hours of energetic fun for kids of all ages.
items.address: Shoprite Mall, Aba Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Bounce House Bonanza
items.short_description: Wall-to-wall trampolines, inflatable obstacle courses, and bounce houses provide a high-energy environment for jumping and bouncing.
items.address: Plot 8, Trans Amadi Industrial Layout, Port Harcourt

items.name: Little City Adventures
items.short_description: A unique indoor play center featuring a miniature city where children can engage in imaginative role-play as doctors, firefighters, and more.
items.address: 12 Rumuigbo Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Climb & Slide Kingdom
items.short_description: An indoor adventure park with climbing walls, giant slides, and rope courses, perfect for developing agility and strength.
items.address: 5 Okporo Road, Rumuodara, Port Harcourt

items.name: Junior Champs Arena
items.short_description: Multiple mini-pitches for football and basketball, designed for young athletes to practice skills and play friendly matches.
items.address: Shell Co-operative Estate, Rumuomasi, Port Harcourt

items.name: Active Kids Sports Zone
items.short_description: Offers various small courts for different sports like tennis, badminton, and volleyball, alongside a running track for children.
items.address: Pleasure Park, Aba Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Goal Getters Mini Pitch
items.short_description: A dedicated facility with small-sided football pitches, perfect for youth leagues, casual games, and football academies.
items.address: 18 Airport Road, Rumuodomaya, Port Harcourt

items.name: Racket Rookies Hub
items.short_description: Focuses on racket sports with mini-courts for tennis and table tennis, offering beginner lessons and friendly competitions.
items.address: 10 Woji Road, GRA Phase 3, Port Harcourt

items.name: Enchanted Forest PH
items.short_description: Wander through a magical forest adorned with life-sized sculptures of fairy tale characters, offering interactive story points.
items.address: Botanical Garden Annex, Old GRA, Port Harcourt

items.name: Princess & Knight Kingdom
items.short_description: A themed park where children can dress up as their favorite royalty or knights, explore castles, and partake in themed games.
items.address: Pleasure Park, Aba Road, Port Harcourt

items.name: Whimsical Woodsland
items.short_description: Discover a magical realm filled with whimsical creatures, hidden pathways, and interactive exhibits inspired by classic fables.
items.address: Opposite Hotel Presidential, Port Harcourt

items.name: Mythical Moments Park
items.short_description: Integrates traditional Nigerian folklore with global fairy tales, offering unique cultural storytelling and themed play areas.
items.address: 22 Peter Odili Road, Port Harcourt
